descript.abstract: Parcels for Yuba County. Digitized from fall 2002 aerial photograph, with reference to Assessor's parcel maps. Updated and maintained by a combination of digitizing the CAD Assessor's changes or COGO entering the updated info.
descript.purpose: For use with GIS software for display and visual reference.
descript.supplinf: Digitized at 1:1500 - 1:3000 for urban areas, 1:3000 - 1:5000 for rural areas.

idinfo.useconst: Information on the map is not intended to constitute advise nor is it to be used as a substitute for specific advice from a licensed professional. You should not act (or refrain from acting) based upon information on the map without independently verifying the information and, as necessary, obtaining professional advice regarding your particular facts and circumstances. Data are licensed to Princeton University-affiliated persons only.

cntorgp.cntorg: County of Yuba Administrative Services Dept, Information Technology Division, GIS Unit
Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University

cntaddr.address: Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.0 (Build 6001) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.0.3348

dataqual.logic: Parcels built from individual shapefiles for each Assessor's parcel book. These were merged, edited, then cleaned in Arc/Info to create coverage topology. Exported from coverage to shapefile for future edits and parcel additions from the Planning Division of the Community Development Department.
dataqual.complete: Shapefile is complete with latest edits from the Planning Division as of 5/18/04. Outstanding issues from the Assessor's department have yet to be incorporated into this file.

horizpa.horizpar: Accuracy of the parcel boundaries is reflective of the scales at which the parcels were digitized (1:1500 to 1:5000 typically), and accuracy of the aerial photography and recognition of physical ground features that mark property boundaries. In some cases, coordinate geometry as noted in Assessor's parcel maps was used to help locate parcel boundaries.

citeinfo.origin: County of Yuba Community Development Department
citeinfo.title: Assessor's parcel maps

procstep.procdesc: Export from coverage with complete and accurate topology to shapefile format.
Individual parcel shapefiles for Assessor's books merged using ArcGIS 8.2 Geoprocessing wizard.

Shapefile conversion to Arc/Info coverage using default fuzzy and dangle processing tolerances. Edited in coverage format to remove sliver polygons for accurate topology. Street rights-of-way attribute values added.

enttyp.enttypd: A "parcel" is an area of land in one ownership and one general use.
enttyp.enttypds: California State Board of Equalization. Assessors' Handbook Section 215.
